scripts.build:fp:js: browserify --full-paths -d app/index.js -o build/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015  ] --plugins [ inferno ] ]
scripts.build:js: browserify --debug -d app/index.js -o bundle.js  -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015  ] --plugins [ inferno ] ]
scripts.watch:js: watchify --debug -d app/index.js -o bundle.js  -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015  ] --plugins [ inferno ] ]
scripts.start: npm run watch:js & npm run watch:css & npm run serve
scripts.bundle:analysis: npm run build:fp:js && npm run minify:js && discify build/bundle.min.js > disc.html --open
